org.opendaylight.controller.clustering.services

Interface ICacheUpdateAware<K,V>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ArpHandler, ConfigurationService, ConnectionManager, ContainerConfigurationService, ContainerManager, ForwardingRulesManager, HostTracker, StatisticsManager, TopologyManagerImpl

    public interface ICacheUpdateAware<K,V>
    Interface that needs to be implemented by the components that want to be informed of an update in a Clustered Cache. The interface need to be registerd in the OSGi service registry with a property "cachenames" which will contains a PropertySet object listing all the caches for which their is interes.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void entryCreated(K key, java.lang.String cacheName, boolean originLocal)
      Invoked when a new entry is available in the cache, the key is only provided, the value will come as an entryUpdate invocation
      void entryDeleted(K key, java.lang.String cacheName, boolean originLocal)
      Called anytime a given key is removed from the ConcurrentHashMap we are listening to.
      void entryUpdated(K key, V new_value, java.lang.String cacheName, boolean originLocal)
      Called anytime a given entry is updated

    • Method Detail

      • entryCreated

        void entryCreated(K key,
                java.lang.String cacheName,
                boolean originLocal)
        Invoked when a new entry is available in the cache, the key is only provided, the value will come as an entryUpdate invocation
        Parameters:
        key - Key for the entry just created
        cacheName - name of the cache for which update has been received
        originLocal - true if the event is generated from this node

      • entryUpdated

        void entryUpdated(K key,
                V new_value,
                java.lang.String cacheName,
                boolean originLocal)
        Called anytime a given entry is updated
        Parameters:
        key - Key for the entry modified
        new_value - the new value the key will have
        cacheName - name of the cache for which update has been received
        originLocal - true if the event is generated from this node

      • entryDeleted

        void entryDeleted(K key,
                java.lang.String cacheName,
                boolean originLocal)
        Called anytime a given key is removed from the ConcurrentHashMap we are listening to.
        Parameters:
        key - Key of the entry removed
        cacheName - name of the cache for which update has been received
        originLocal - true if the event is generated from this node
